title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.30 - Multiple establishments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.30 - Multiple establishments

State Regulations
(a) The employer must keep a separate SH 900 log for each establishment that is
expected to be in operation for one year or longer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
801.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
